name: The Bumblz Theme
lyric:
In a wild mountain meadow

There lives a bumble bee

Bumblz and his friends

Are just like family

There's Spinny and there's Corky

Slomo and Fuzzette

And together they're the most creative bugs you've ever met

They have fun thrills and laughter

While learning lessons too

Bumblz loves adventures

And sharing them with you

So won't you come along

And sing this song with me

Cause Bumblz and his friends
All live in harmony

Bumblz and his friends
All live in harmony
